Sentence: Now grown, Lucielia has a daughter, Serena, with a man named Eugene
Eugene, in addition to constantly leaving Lucielia, also treats her (Serena) and their daughter terribly
While Lucielia and Eugene are fighting, Serena chases a roach into an electric socket with a fork
She (Serena) is electrocuted and dies, leaving Lucielia nearly lifeless with grief
Following the funeral, Mattie is the one who begins to release Lucielia's enormous grief by rocking and bathing her (Serena) until she (Serena) falls asleep crying
